overview: Aldious oricon DVD ranking, all the live DVD has ranked in the TOP10. And records Aldious largest-ever mobilization in 7/2018 Osaka concert one-man tour for additional performances (12-Higashi-Meihan) announcement, and the fan base is expanding. LIQUIDROOM performances, was held in the 7/2018 in the Tokyo video has been made. Tracklist 1. Opening 2. We Are 3... Persevere 4. Cherry 5. Dear man 6. Scabby Heart 7. Instrumental 5 8. Travelers 9. Without You 10. die for you 11. Moment 12. Absolute 13. Dominator 14. Go away 15. Re:fire 16. IN THIS WORLD 17. Utopia 18. title: Aldious – Aldious Tour 2018 We Are
